website_summaries.verdict: These wired headphones include nice features whether you're using them to make calls or to listen to music.
pros: Includes passive noise cancellation to reduce background noise when listening to music or making calls
A busy light on the headphones turns on during a call to let other people know you're busy
Includes both a USB and a 3.5-millimeter jack to connect to devices
cons: The ear pads start to wear down over time and the sound quality is better for calls than for listening to music

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for people like me that work at home and care about what people on the other side hears. No one can tell that I work from home when I'm using this. I can join online meetings using the USB connection and I can join phone conferences using my cell phone. I have a baby daughter that makes a lot of noise but as long as I have the door closed, no one can tell. -update The mic picks up your breathing which is annoying. Good mic but there are better choices out there. My daily driver is the plantronics voyager legend. Noise cancelling on the mic is better on the voyager.
customer_reviews.author: ss2985

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months, USD dongle died suddenly.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this format with both a USB and audio mini-plug. However, the usb dongle suddenly died about a week ago. I've tried contacting customer support via phone and email without success. Still hoping to get warranty support and add stars to my review. A couple of other comments: The ear pad is not terribly comfortably for me, but not unbearable. Also, a nice addition would be a lapel clip for the headset cable.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: USB connector failed
customer_reviews.text: Was attracted to the flexibility of both a USB connection for the computer plus the 3.5 jack for tablets/phone use. USB connector failed in the middle of a call less than 60 days after purchase, and now won't work on any other computer or USB port. Seller won't take the return so I'm left with an expensive 3.5mm headset.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: When it works its not bad BUT....
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this twice in the last year but it seems to only have a life of about 4-5 months Both times the set has broken on us at the same spot, at the switch that resides on the line for muting and other options on the headset. This was a big plus for getting this set and the first time we chalked it up to just bad luck or such and since my husband loved it for work we ordered it again only to have the same piece break again. We will look for another one and probably not a Jabra. Too expensive to have to be replacing it twice a year.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but Too Many Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for home office use, primarily plugged into iPhone. I had the same problem as others that when you move the cord at all it makes a noise in the headpiece. Jack also caused cracking noise every time it moved in phone. Also is much heavier than other headsets on the market. Warranty claim with Jabra was referred back to Amazon, which thankfully provided a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Coy G.

customer_reviews.title: Good to MS teams!
customer_reviews.text: The Jabra Evolve 40 UC is a wired headset, basic yet better quality. I use quite a few different types of Jabra products, so I know this headset will be pretty good. The Evolve 40 is perfect for Microsoft Teams and Zoom meetings. The MIC is useable, picks up echo at times. However, even the best headsets do that. I would only use this for business use, nothing more! The ear cups are reasonably comfortable for long periods of use but not all day in one sitting. The price is tad high but again its backed by a good manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Quality Representative of Cost
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headset for use with my iPhone for work from home. I've found it to be very comfortable during extended use and voice clarity to be excellent. Since I plug the headphone directly into my phone, I am not able to use the included control device (volume/call disconnect) as it only has a USB plug. This was not clear in the product description and is certainly inconvenient, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: MARK J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Same as everyone-working from home due to COVID and a million and one meetings to go to. Excellent sound quality and comfort for the price. I’m not looking to invest in insanely expensive headphones right now (or maybe never) unless I need to. Excellent product! I’m glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: M~

customer_reviews.title: Client Couldn't Hear Me
customer_reviews.text: Had difficulty making myself heard with this headset, specifically when the client was using the conference call phone. Others (using headsets) for the call could hear me clearly, but overall, I found myself shouting to be heard in the conference room. The next headset purchased (a Plantronics) seemed to work well and resolve the issue. In general, I could hear clearly with the Jabra Evolve and appreciated the long cord. However, the headset didn't seem to plug in securely to the USB. Not sure whether that was affecting the headset's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa and Josh

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The headset is garbage. You have to continue to monitor the sound settings so the input doesn't take in the office noise.
customer_reviews.author: David Wolan

customer_reviews.title: headset is uncomfortable -- this headset isn't worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset on the strength of reviews on Wirecutter and amazon. the headset is touted as being extremely comfortable, great fo rall-day use. Well it isn't. The one earcup fits tightly on my ear, causing a lot of pressure. The circular controller module is heavy and causes the cord to "droop", making it difficult to position. And, for some reason, every time I touch the cord I can hear it through the headset. The sound quality of the headset is good, as is the microphone positioning and quality. If I hadn't thrown away some of the packaging I'd return it and get my money back. Don't buy this headset.
customer_reviews.author: John Riehl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset for working from a home office
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good purchase. The headset fits well, Windows 10 immediately identifies the device when connecting via the USB and loads the driver. Headset comes with quick visual instruction book, to show you how to operate the controls. It also comes with a zippered fabric storage pouch. The audio reception is excellent, and the audio to the audience is excellent. Definitely straighten the red audio lead before you don the headset; it is heavy and well-constructed, but will curl if you don't straighten it beforehand (and a curled cable can be distracting).
customer_reviews.author: J. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. I am on conference calls most of the day, they dont hurt your ears and dound quality is wonderful. Love that i can also plug into my phone and use for calls there. Great forvmusic on my pc while working
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Olivia O.

customer_reviews.title: Use at work on Zoom calls
customer_reviews.text: Since there are folks around me at work, I moved away from using my desk speaker/microphone unit (Jabra 710 - which is great btw) and purchased these to help me with both call privacy and keeping my voice down while on calls. These work great and interact well with Slack, Teams, and Zoom for muting and volume. Occasionally Zoom thinks I am muted when these do not, but that is very rare.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Dot Com

customer_reviews.title: Usable with a variety of devices such as computers and cellphones
customer_reviews.text: This product includes a junction box that allows you to use it with multiple devices. Sound quality is excellent, very clear, as I would expect from digital. The junction box also has the sound level adjustment buttons which are convenient to use. Calls to the manufacturer's support department prior to purchase convinced me that this outfit is a first-class manufacturer that fully supports its products.
customer_reviews.author: Sprari

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones but I'm returning them!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality headphones - very lightweight, comfortable, easy to setup and use. BUT there was one BIG problem for me so I am returning them. In short, when using the headphones, you do not hear your voice through the headphones. In other words, you hear a muffled voice. Strangely, when you play a recording back, your voice is clear as day through the headphones. I called Jabra and they said it was related to the OS system on the mac and this model. When I checked with a colleague, she had the same experience so she bought a higher level Jabra that works the way it should!
customer_reviews.author: AKS

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancellation couldn't be better!
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancelling mic is wonderful. I often use it in the car and it cancels out every bit of the road noise. I do use it for singing as well, and when I get to a certain volume level it does overwhelm the mic. I'm sure sound guys out there would have a word for it, but on the recording you can hear a kind of distortion if I am singing too loud. It helps somewhat if I point the microphone at my chin, and even doing that the noise cancellation remains top notch. If they could fix the distortion at the higher volume would absolutely be 5 stars. Otherwise, a very good noise cancellation microphone.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: high failure rate
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 10 of these for a call center I run, and they consistently fail on Windows 10/Mac machines. The USB puck seems to short out after about 3-4 months of use and it becomes a brick...they only part that works at this point is the Headset with the 3.5 standard audio jack connection - our hosted VOIP system requires a USB headset on windows machines. Will be attempting a return on these items.
customer_reviews.author: mjmontagne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Sound - Not too comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Although the New York Times rated this product tops - I was disappointed. The sound quality was fair - but it was hard to hear your own voice - and the voices of other people sounded very deep and muffled. I have a large head, and the headphones didn't adjust sufficiently. Other people told me that the microphone sound quality was great. Overall, I preferred the Ear Pods that came with my Apple computer, so I returned the Jabra headset -
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good audio quality, but the (wired) headphone cable is too short
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset frequently for conference calls. The audio quality is good, and the headset is fairly comfortable. The only problem I have is that, at 3ft, the headphone cable is way too short. This is the part that connects the actual headphones to the controller. It has a proprietary connector (standard stereo plug, but with 2 flat sides), which helps prevent accidental disconnects. But since it's short, it gives very limited mobility while on calls, and due to the proprietary connector, it can't be extended. Otherwise, it's a very good set.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: I spend hours per day on international conference calls, and I sometimes need to type at the same time, which means I must use a headset. I tried a number of different options before landing on this Jabra set - and it has been just about perfect! I love that you can rotate the boom microphone to either side, so it can be worn on either ear.
customer_reviews.author: J. Book

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and materials. Cord is a little cheap tho.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is much better than cheap headsets youd get from work. The ear muffs are comfortable and clear. My mic works well but can only move a little bit away from the face or closer to the face, so it's not too flexible there. The middle control hub is nice and works well. The only issue is the 3.5 mic connection to the control hub; its loose and if moved, will cause a loss of sound. As long as you arent moving or pulling on the cord too much, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bryen Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Corporate headset quality for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to run my home based business from a cellphone and I have to say that I am blown away at the quality and clarity that this headset offers. I speak in my normal voice and the other person I'm talking to has no problem hearing me. I have tried Bluetooth headsets only to put them in a drawer to collect dust. I assure you this headset will never be in a drawer. It is top shelf for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These sound pretty good, but with caveats
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, touching the wire from the headphones to the puck is noisy, almost like the wire entry point is behind a membrane. This isn't an electrical connection problem, it's something physical. Microsoft Teams has screwed up something as simple as the bell hook button - check your favorite search engine, this is a Teams problem, it broke headphones which used to work. Busy light, volume control and mute work perfectly well as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE Product on ARRIVAL. Plugged it in 1st time and stereo does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a defective Jabra Headset but unfortunately did not use it until after the allowed return date !! So I cannot return to Amazon apparently... But it is hoped Jabra makes this right and sends a replacement. Waiting their reply. I have a separate set for work that functions just fine and that was the reason I purchased this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year and broke
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headset for a year now and the right earpiece has detached from its housing. I'm a moderate to heavy user, using it more for phone conversations than for music. The sound quality is fair at best. I would frequently get complaints from people that they could hear an echo whenever I was on. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vicunia

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect using them for extended periods. I work from home via the internet and use them for 6+ hours a day. Very comfortable even at the end of the day and the sound quality is great. Good quality feel in your hand too. These are not bluetooth but Jabra makes them. I needed usb connected ones for work.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Had decent sound and I really liked having a call light indicator so my co-workers knew when I was on the phone. But the audio seemed to go to sleep whenever there wasn't a constant stream of music so not really feasible as a communications device as well as receiving computer notifications. Plus I could still hear everything going on in the background which was really distracting.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive and fall apart too easy
customer_reviews.text: Work OK with Skype for business in our office but they are way overpriced and poor quality. After less then a year the plastic starts falling apart. We originally bought quite a few for our office, after a year or so they are all in the bin replaced with a variety of much much cheaper alternatives that seem to work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, better price!
customer_reviews.text: Since getting this headset, I've had people asking me what headset I'm using because it sounds so amazing on the other end. I use it on my Mac and have no problems with it at all as far as compatibility goes. I've used it with FaceTime, Skype, Google Hangouts, Google Meet and Slack and it works perfect with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jandreau

customer_reviews.title: Best desktop headset I have owned to date.  Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headset. Versatile, with great sound and microphone. I use these for Skype calls, GoToMeeting, and Rosetta Stone. They have not failed me yet! Installed instantly on Windows 7 and 10. Lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Compared to what you can pay for a Jabra headset...this is a nice
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for daily and long term use. I use this headset daily for Skype meetings that can go on for a long time. I had a more expensive unit for years and it finally wore out. I don't expect any less from this headset.
customer_reviews.author: B. Buckalew

customer_reviews.title: Volume control on standard phone system not good.
customer_reviews.text: The mic does not have a volume control, at least when attached to phone system. On the phone 90% of my day and have multiple people tell me they can't hear me. Very disappointed for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy K. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very good sound
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset for Skype calls, listening to music, and movie streaming. Comfortable to wear and very good sound quality. The connection cord does not crimp as my previous Logitech headset cord did. Detachable cord allows to also use the headset with my Samsung S7 cellphone. UPDATE: After using for several months it remains comfortable to wear for hours. The spongy part around the ear is especially good. As mentioned before, the connection cord is round-ish preventing crimping and is plenty long to maneuver around my desk. Recommended highly.
customer_reviews.author: Alan E

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and needed a great pair of headphones and I'm so glad I purchased these. I have previously brought other headphones and ultimately ended up returning them. I no longer struggle with being heard while talking to clients, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my home office for work calls on my mobile phone to free up my hands. I have asked numerous people how it sounds and, so far, there are no complaints. The headset feels sturdy and I have packed it in my laptop bag on a few flights with no issues. I have had this for several weeks and it is MUCH better sounding than any of the Bluetooth devices I used previously. I would buy this again knowing what I know now.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a home office
customer_reviews.text: The headset is fairly comfortable but It feels a bit small for my head. Maybe my head is too big who knows, but even with the adjustable band, i couldn't get it to sit just right. Other than that, I thought it was a good buy for the price, good for a home office.
customer_reviews.author: AggieFan

customer_reviews.title: Review site that declared this the best headset is right!
customer_reviews.text: Great headset. Was mainly looking for a headset that preserved my voice in good quality while blocking out all other ambient noise. This one performs superbly on. Overall quality of sound is great and very comfortable for wearing all day. If you work from home or in an otherwise noisy environment, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: Very good option for work
customer_reviews.text: Pros. Very good quality in general, love the volume control. The audio quality is very good for conversations. Very comfortables. Cons. There is no easy usb connector you must bring all the control in order to connect to USB port. The mute function just moving the microphone in to the up position is no really muting the sound it just reduce the mic volumen but still active.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Warrior

customer_reviews.title: no doubt $$$. but excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: no doubt a bit pricey for a corded pc telephone / jabber headset. but tis top quality. had a logitech - it fell apart after 3 weeks. am sure the bluetooh jabra is excellet but $190.00. in the end - no regrets - excellent for pc phone use
customer_reviews.author: rube

customer_reviews.title: Very good to use in the office.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Good packaging. Smaller, compact and lighter. The foam pads are actually very small but comfortable. It's coming with the control puck so you can light up the left ear cup to show you are busy on a call. Good job of cleanup up noise and background sounds. Ideal for use in the office. Good microphone. Dislikes: Not for audiophiles.
customer_reviews.author: jfcb_ice

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is like buying from a shady flea market
customer_reviews.text: The headset is fine but Amazon appears to have sold me a refurbished model as if it were new. The original box was not included and the paperwork was wrinkled. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones that work just fine
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones that work just fine. I like the boom mic that gets the element right where it needs to be, and stays there (yet folds out of the way easily). The headphones are not quite audiophile quality, sounding a bit muffled when listening to music (while still usable for that), but are great for phone calls and conferencing. I love that I can use the same headset plugged directly into my phone, or plug into a computer using the included USB adapter with controls.
customer_reviews.author: David Rush

customer_reviews.title: Great for conference calls
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for leading conference calls and for chilling out afterwards. I can hear my colleagues much more clearly than on the bluetooth headset I had used before. They work well with Skype on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headset!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very clear to hear the person on the other end. I love the access to the mute button and the option to use as simply headphones to listen to music on other devices by detaching the USB port. The headset also comes with travel bag and it's height can be adjusted reasonably. It was worth every penny! So far so good...I've been using this headset for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, comfortable, ease of use, simple to begin using right away. They came highly recommended and I can see why.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy M.

customer_reviews.title: My customers here me and me only... it’s great
customer_reviews.text: So it is so important for me a salesman in a loud office to have headphones with a mic that only picks up my voice and nothing else. I don’t want my potential prospects thinking I’m in a loud grimey call center. It was hard to find a pair of headphones that does it as well as These headphones do. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tanner yates

customer_reviews.title: Hear and be heard above the noise
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this headset. I can still hear some ambient noise, but it is quiet in the background and the volume of the headset is more than sufficient to overcome what noise filters in. I'm not at all distracted by the background noise. Also, callers consistently report not being able to tell I'm in a room that has significant street noise. This headset is comfortable to wear and the cord has substantial heft to it, so I'm guessing it won't be damaged any time soon. I haven't used it with my computer yet, but it has been an ideal solution for work calls from my cellphone.
customer_reviews.author: Runderdog

customer_reviews.title: Headphone not in commercial packaging
customer_reviews.text: No commercial packaging, headphone coming in Ziploc bag. The volume control button brings in noises. There're better choices around.
customer_reviews.author: etczhil

customer_reviews.title: Read description thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: The sound is inconsistent. Read the description thoroughly. I thought I was getting a two ear headset. What came was a one ear set. I was in a bind and needed it for work so didn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent for jabber. worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: am using it for cisco jabber. excellent. much better than the basic logitech headset. use it for mic for pc gaming as well.
customer_reviews.author: rube

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate listing
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with usb connector. Had to order this elsewhere and in end cost much more. Listing was deceiving and did not state this at top and had pictures of usb remote. Beware and search the listing carefully. I was going to use this for medical dictation. Thanks for creating more work for me middle of a pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, but uncomfortable after about 30 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality input/output. A bit uncomfortable on the ear after 30 minutes or so. Pressure on the ears is not adjustable to different head sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Marquina

customer_reviews.title: bad product stay away
customer_reviews.text: really bad quality sound. within couple of days of use I am hearing squeaking sound . didn't expect this from jabra
customer_reviews.author: mbk

customer_reviews.title: Works great - wish I could bend the microphone
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I love being able to plug in to either an audio port or a usb port. However I wish the microphone was bendable. Even with that issue I am happy to recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great in low-mid noise workplace environments
customer_reviews.text: Works great in low-mid noise workplace environments. Call clarity is very clear and the microphone quality is solid. The buttons built onto the input line work well with Cisco Webex.
customer_reviews.author: LtMajorBones

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, poor design and build
customer_reviews.text: Good headset until it broke (lasted about 3-1/2 months). Right cup snapped off and then wire disconnected. Used while WFH, left in my office. I own several headphones by Bose and have never broken any. These aren’t as expensive, but they do cost $100+
customer_reviews.author: GadgetLovingGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I had a $300 set of noise cancelling headset that simply didn't work and the Jabra at a fraction of the price delivers on quality for the price. The noise reducing microphone is what I was really after and it's perfect in my very noisy office area!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hurtubise

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Well made. indifferent sound, works well with Windows10/Skype, earpieces are warm; noise cancellation is nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: genie

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great - Extremely Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the flexibility of a single headset for 3.5mm and USB calls when I travel, but after an hour of use, they are too painful to keep. The ear pads don't have enough padding, but they sounded great and folks on the call said I sounded fine. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter66

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for online teaching
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pair for a year. They are so very comfortable. The only issues I've had is the microphone sometimes swivels down when I don't want it to move. The volume controls have been having trouble responding also. I'm happy they're comfortable, that's why I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Great headset.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best I have used. Great sound quality and easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: H. Stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 31 days
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality until it wasn’t. Use for work so on Monday the 22nd I discovered I could no longer hear the other person. Return period ended on Saturday the 20th. Not a user issue as fails on two laptops and multiple calls and meetings. Did not travel with this and only used in office.
customer_reviews.author: LJEJG

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product when we were sent to work from home, its been great. It allows me to connect to my phone and roam around the house without being tied to pc. Sound is great, volume control in junction box is awesome. I would buy again for my team members.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Corona

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: System came in a ziplock baggie and no box. Set is only usb and does not have a 3mm jack as advertised. Will not buy again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tweed

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones. Look and sound great. One item for me personally is the ear pad could be a little larger. Headphones work perfectly with my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M. Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The Jabra exceeded my expectations in all respects; comfort, volume and sound quality. My old headset from the 1970's would not work with the new wireless phones but the Jabra was super in all respects.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Professional
customer_reviews.text: High quality, professional headset. Very good sound quality over mic... a few people in my office have tried them and they perform perfectly on calls. They aren’t super comfortable after multiple hours, however, and don’t really block out other office sounds.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Amazon won't help
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work properly after use of 31 days. Amazon then would not help me to replace because it was over 30 days. Really 1 day....it is not my fault the headset stopped working 1 day after. Very disappointed with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Eimen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent noise control and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Plantronics V5200 Bluetooth headset for 7 months connecting laptop which is good for speaking but introduces quite bad sound quality. This one introduces me quite awesome noise cancellation & sound quality at the same time. I am quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Great noise canceling.  Not bulky a plus.
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent. Not bulky and has a mute button. I've been using them for teaching virtual classes while my kids are making noises and it cancels the noise. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After a couple of months no clear audio
customer_reviews.text: Worked only for a couple of months. Really disappointed after reading all the stellar reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few days. Then totally failed.
customer_reviews.text: Was great for the few days it worked. Then it just stopped. Support was no help. So, easy to return so that was good. A shame.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love the sound clarity and the long cord
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Tomes

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone/mic set
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use for meetings and have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Neysa Nevins

customer_reviews.title: Sound great, a little tight on my head.
customer_reviews.text: These sound great and everyone can hear me fine. They get a little uncomfortable after an hour or so. Next time I would consider wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: No noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I really only wanted these for the noise cancelling feature which is nonexistent. I work from home and it doesn't help with any background noise. They are comfortable at least but not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over my old Jabra headset. I can hear so much better now with stereo and others commented how much clearer I sound on calls. Plug and play for Skype, at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great desk phone solution for home office at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Clear communication, comfortable. I like over the ear headphones for long time use.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio L. Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and noise cancellation. I had some construction going on outside and no one could hear it on the call. I like how the 1/8” AUX cable works with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product , but first pair broke before I got to use it Second pair just melted in the sun in my room and left a sticky mess
customer_reviews.author: Leon Bolton

customer_reviews.title: I like the busy light feature
customer_reviews.text: as advertised, can make your ears hot when worn for an extended period of time
customer_reviews.author: mjohio

customer_reviews.title: Multiple compliments on sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea my computer's internal microphone was so bad until I bought this. Have received three compliments on my teleconference audio in the past week alone.
customer_reviews.author: Ranting Raven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, less expensive wired headset
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, less expensive wired headset. I'd like it more if it could extend a bit farther (it barely reaches both ears at full extension), but this headset is comfortable, provides good noise isolation, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Work well, comfort lacking.
customer_reviews.text: Sound and functions as advertised. Not comfortable for extended period of time. Especially with hard frames glasses.
customer_reviews.author: The J Family

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I tested the sound cancellation, as I work from home and I love having my fan full blast I needed something to block out the noise, and it seems to work I made a call and they couldn't hear the fan or basic background noise.. I'm excited to work with them.
customer_reviews.author: maricela godinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and feel like these have saved me my job. The microphone noise cancellation is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It works as good as advertised and it’s very useful. It has the matte finish which makes it look nicer and the microphone has a magnet so you can put it on the band while you’re not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Gisselle Villaescusa

customer_reviews.title: This has worked well for listening and recording. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well for listening and recording. I got it to use with dragon naturally speaking and it has done all that I wanted to do without issues with light background noise.
customer_reviews.author: GRRR

customer_reviews.title: Broke Within 5 months
customer_reviews.text: The headphones have already started to quit. Statically when taking calls on Avaya.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very surprised by the call clarity, and like that I can actually use these with a phone jack when needed. Very comfy to use for hours too.
customer_reviews.author: Daetrin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: These work wonders and are great quality. I just wish they were wireless!
customer_reviews.author: amwalther

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good mic, light weight, easy setup. If using a docking station, make sure to connect it directly to laptop; otherwise there may be interference noise.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lupas

customer_reviews.title: The Noise cancelation is not perfekt but the headset works good
customer_reviews.text: Product is in a good condition and everything works well.. But the Noise cancelation ist not that what i expected.. when people talking around me or when people dropping the glasses in the sink the mic record it.... when you work in a co working Space like me ( digital nomad ) i can't recommended but when you use it at home in a separated room the headset works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: They do the Job
customer_reviews.text: I guess this item is one of the many things we need to get adapt to the "new normal". They work fine for web based meetings. Could do worse, could do better.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headset for business calls made from my house where there can be a noisy environment. Thus far the headphones are working as advertised as my associates can hear very little of the background noise, even when there is a lot of noise.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device I am in sales a lot of calls
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Couzynse

customer_reviews.title: Sound and comfort
customer_reviews.text: The sound is unsurpassable and the noise reduction as well. My only complaint is they don't stay on my head. I battle with them every time I want to move. I teach online and I have to reach for things. They fall off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Setty Attias

customer_reviews.title: I would have expected better quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing. I bought these at the end of January and I am extremely careful with them. They broke already by June! I would have expected better quality for the price. Since it has been 5 months since purchase, Amazon won't let me return. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Randi T.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality and usability of product are great. Nice feel and lightweight too. Works well overall
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Jabra Evolve 40 UC Stereo Wired Headset / Music Headphones (U.S. Retail Packaging)
product_meta.description: Style:UC Optimized (Standard)| Color:Stereo SpeakerProfessional headset for greater productivity and amazing sound for calls and music. To block out distraction, the headset contains passive noise cancellation and has a special busy light that turns Red to let people know when you’re on the phone. You can also turn it on manually when you don’t want to be disturbed. If you are heading out of the office, easily transfer your Skype for business and Lync PC calls to your smartphone and continue the call while on the go.
feature_bullets: Passive noise cancellation to eliminate background noise and provide amazing sound on both ends of the call
Easily transfer your Skype for business and Lync PC calls to your smartphone for calls on the go
Option to connect to devices via USB or 3.5 millimeter Jack
Works with all the most popular online voice call services
Integrated busy light automatically turns on during a call to let others know you are busy. Cord length Control cable 95 centimeter, HS cable 120 centimeter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,123 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Pouch, Poly bag, Warranty leaflet, Foam inlay, Quick start guide, Layer card, Warning leaflet, Jabra Evolve 40 headset
